name: Junior/Middle Python developer
description:
Backend Developer will be responsible for creating new and maintaining old computational and infrastructure cloud services. C++ is used for computational part and Python is used for infrastructure code. We have 6 developers, 1 DevOps and 2 SQA automation engineers in Moscow. We follow DevOps model, so service developer is responsible for deploying it and supporting it in Production.

In this role, you will…

  • Design and implement new services
  • Design and document APIs
  • Support old services
  • Communicate with BA and frontend developers
  • Write deployment scripts
  • Learn AWS stack

In this role, you’ll need …

  • Solid knowledge of Python
  • Cloud experience and C++ knowledge is a plus but not a must
  • Cross platform development skills
  • Bachelor degree in Computer Science, Mathematics or Physics
  • Good written and normal oral English

  • Benefits
  • Interesting tasks and the opportunity to work on an innovative product in a strong team
  • Full medical insurance for employees and their children (including dentistry), life insurance, travel insurance, a doctor available in the office
  • 100% paid sick leave
  • 28 days of paid vacation per year + 3 additional days
  • Lunch allowance
  • Reimbursement of sports and ergonomics of the home workplace
  • Discounts on Invisalign treatment for employees and their family members
  • English courses payment
  • Courses/books/conferences for professional development reimbursement
  • Comfortable office with gym ("Danilovskaya Manufactory", Tulskaya metro station)
  • Remote work for the pandemic period (hybrid format is possible)
